item.title: ftp.mapsforge.org is outdated
item.description:
From DirkWind...@gmail.com on July 22, 2013 08:11:11
Hello,
the most files (maybe all) on ftp.mapsforge.org are strongly outdated. For example Germany is generated at the 4th February 2013.
I found no information, that the automatic update will be stopped, so I expect a little bit newer files there, or are I'm completley wrong?
I'll apreciate if this could be checked, as I like the generated files very much!
Thanks in advance, DW
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=441

item.contents:
From LudwigBr...@gmail.com on January 18, 2014 02:30:02
Issue 467 has been merged into this issue.

From jjbross@gmail.com on January 25, 2014 04:34:54
The data available at ftp.mapsforge.org (and download.mapsforge.org) are hosted by Freie Universit√§t Berlin (FUB). This was totally fine when Thilo and I were studying/employed at the FUB. But since I graduated last year there is no one left at the FUB who is actively involved in the mapsforge project. A few days agao, Thilo and I had a private discussion about the future of the ftp.mapsforge.org service: we came to the conclusion that we have to shut it down in the near future. However, we are aware that such a service is essential, so we hope that the community can manage to setup something similar. There will be a separate mail on the mailing list discussing this topic.
Status: Started Owner: jjbross@gmail.com

From s.luksc...@googlemail.com on March 12, 2014 03:47:11
Before shutting it down, is it possible to get some information from you to perhaps continue your work?
